quiz.quizinstructions:
How to play


  • Once you've chosen your ACTOS teammate, click Play to start questions.
  • Answer as many questions correctly before the buzzer.
  • Decrease the "Type 2 diabetes defects meter." The lower your score, the better! You win!

How to play


  • Play alternates between teams once you've chosen your ACTOS teammate.
  • Click Play to start questions.
  • Decrease the "Type 2 diabetes defects meter." The lower your score, the better! Your team wins!
